item.title: Moving My Blog To Hugo
item.description: I have been blogging for nearly 15 years nowâ€”gosh, I feel so old. Like most, I started on Blogger and then moved to WordPress.com. From WordPress, I moved to Tumblr, to Medium, and to Jekyll for a short period and then a self-hosted WordPress. Sometimes, I wonder why Google is still keeping Blogger alive. I know people are still using it. But Google killed Google Reader when people were still using it and loving it.
